airport.title: Airport Ride
airport.paragraph: Embark on seamless journeys with our airport transfer service effortlessly whisking you to and from your destination in style, comfort, and punctuality, leaving you free to relax or prepare for your next adventure.

schedule.title: Scheduled Ride
schedule.paragraph: Embark on seamless journeys with our airport transfer service effortlessly whisking you to and from your destination in style, comfort, and punctuality, leaving you free to relax or prepare for your next adventure.

ride.title: Ride By Hour
ride.paragraph: Secure your peace of mind with our pre-scheduled car bookings, ensuring prompt, reliable transportation with experienced drivers at your service, tailored to your itinerary and preferences.

errors.short_distance: The booking distance is very short, please modify the reservation locations

services.heading: Our Services
services.paragraph: Join us and learn about our service in digital transformation and discover the unlimited possibilities that await you.

term.first_welcome_text: Welcome to our website for scheduled vehicle and driver booking. This website provides a service for booking vehicles with qualified drivers for predetermined periods. Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the website.
term.second_your_text: Your use of the website constitutes your express agreement to all of the terms and conditions contained in this document.
term.third_must_text: You must create an account on the website to submit booking requests.
term.booking_p1_text: You can submit booking requests for vehicles with drivers.
term.booking_p2_text: You must specify the date, time, and location of the start and end of the trip.
term.booking_p3_text: Booking fees are determined based on the Booking type, vehicle type, and trip duration.
term.booking_con_p1_text: Booking is confirmed after completing the payment process.
term.booking_con_p3_text: The booking may be canceled by the website in some cases, such as the unavailability of the vehicle or driver, in this case, the booking fee will be returned.
term.liability_p1_text: The website is not responsible for any damage or loss that may be caused to you or your belongings during the trip.
term.liability_p2_text: The driver is responsible for the vehicle's and passengers' safety during the trip.
term.modification_p_text: The website reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions any time.
term.jurisdiction_p_text: All disputes related to using this website are subject to the laws and jurisdiction of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
term.note_p1_text: Additional terms and conditions may apply to specific services on the website.
term.note_p2_text: You can contact the website's customer service if you have any questions or inquiries.
term.note_p3_text: Thank you for using our website.
